This page describes the set of tools used to develop this application and how to install/configure them.

= Development tools =

Here is the list of tools used in the development process

  * [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/ Eclipse IDE]
  * [http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp Java SE Development Kit]
  * [http://slick.cokeandcode.com/index.php Slick - 2D Game Library based on LWJGL]
  * [http://www.lwjgl.org/ The Lightweight Java Game Library]
  * [http://www.cokeandcode.com/phys2d/ Phys2D is a 2D physics engine written in Java]
  * [http://ant.apache.org/index.html Apache Ant is a Java-based build tool]
  * [http://ebuild.firefang.net/ EBuild - An ant based generic build system for Java projects developed in Eclipse]
  * [http://subclipse.tigris.org/ Subclipse is an Eclipse Team Provider plug-in]
